sentences.sContent: The steel pillars began to buckle.

remMethod.val: 扣紧(buckle)雄鹿(buck)， 拿来煮肉

trans.tranCn: 扣紧； 变形； 弯曲
trans.tranOther: to become bent or curved because of heat or pressure, or to make something bend or curve in this way
a piece of metal used for fastening the two ends of a belt, for fastening a shoe, bag etc, or for decoration
